languages.text: "Священный Патент перечеркнул {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}ваше{/d} прошлое. Теперь вы призваны на службу Императору — и провалиться мне в бездну, если я хоть раз упрекну вас за прежние деяния".

"The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."
languages.original_text: "Священный Патент перечеркнул {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}ваше{/d} прошлое. Теперь вы призваны на службу Императору — и провалиться мне в бездну, если я хоть раз упрекну вас за прежние деяния".

traits.locale_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

"The sacred Warrant has wiped the slate of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your past{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

"The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

"The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

"The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

languages.text: "Der heilige Handelsbrief hat {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Eure Kriminalakte{/d} getilgt. Ihr wurdet nun dazu berufen, dem Imperator zu deinen – und ich will bei der Leere verdammt sein, sollte ich Euch je für frühere Taten tadeln."
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: "Der heilige Handelsbrief hat {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Eure Kriminalakte{/d} getilgt. Ihr wurdet nun dazu berufen, dem Imperator zu deinen – und ich will bei der Leere verdammt sein, sollte ich Euch je für frühere Taten tadeln."

languages.text: « Grâce à la lettre de marque, vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}une seconde chance{/d}. Vous êtes désormais {mf|appelé|appelée} à servir l'Empereur. Que le vide m'emporte si j'ose vous reprocher vos erreurs passées. »
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: « Grâce à la lettre de marque, vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}une seconde chance{/d}. Vous êtes désormais {mf|appelé|appelée} à servir l'Empereur. Que le vide m'emporte si j'ose vous reprocher vos erreurs passées. »

languages.text: “神圣授状已经把你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}过去的一切{/d}一笔勾销。如今你受到征召，肩负侍奉帝皇的使命。如果我再为你过去的所作所为而谴责你，那我简直是罪该万死。”
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: “神圣授状已经把你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}过去的一切{/d}一笔勾销。如今你受到征召，肩负侍奉帝皇的使命。如果我再为你过去的所作所为而谴责你，那我简直是罪该万死。”

languages.text: «La sagrada Patente supone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}un lienzo en blanco{/d}. Se l{mf|e|a} ha convocado para servir al Emperador, y yo no tengo derecho ni intención de criticar sus actos pasados».
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: «La sagrada Patente supone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}un lienzo en blanco{/d}. Se l{mf|e|a} ha convocado para servir al Emperador, y yo no tengo derecho ni intención de criticar sus actos pasados».

languages.text: 「聖なる令状が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}あなたの前科{/d}を帳消しにした。今やあなたは皇帝陛下に仕えるために召喚されたのです。ですから、もし私が過去の行いを理由にあなたを咎めるようなことがあれば、虚空に堕ちても構いません」
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる令状が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}あなたの前科{/d}を帳消しにした。今やあなたは皇帝陛下に仕えるために召喚されたのです。ですから、もし私が過去の行いを理由にあなたを咎めるようなことがあれば、虚空に堕ちても構いません」

languages.text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}databelanızı{/d} temizledi ve İmparator'a hizmet etmek üzere çağrıldınız. Olur da size geçmişteki eylemleriniz için laf edersem uçsuz beni kahretsin."
languages.original_text: "The sacred Warrant has wiped {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}your slate{/d} clean. Now you have been summoned to serve the Emperor — and I'll be damned to the void if I ever once rebuke you for your past deeds."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}databelanızı{/d} temizledi ve İmparator'a hizmet etmek üzere çağrıldınız. Olur da size geçmişteki eylemleriniz için laf edersem uçsuz beni kahretsin."
